title: New: Ides – Prisms
body:
**Photo: Sonny Malhotra**

**Alanna McArdle** is one busy girl.

Having just finished a trio of support slots with CitR pals Youth Lagoon under the **A Grave With No Name** guise, she’s also found time to announce not one, but two new releases, with her solo project **Ides**, and as part of **Joanna Gruesome**. Whereas some musicians seem to start new projects for the hell of it, there’s a genuine feeling that Alanna brings something entirely unique to each of her three current outfits. Her new track, _Prisms_, released under the Ides moniker, is a touching, perfectly written acoustic number, relying solely upon McArdle’s lyrical proficiency and stunning vocals. Check out Prisms below.

_could you think of anything worse than being with me_
